hero.name: Lucas Cavalcante dos Santos
hero.title: Data Analyst | AI & Machine Learning | Computer Vision
hero.description: Data Analyst with experience in AI, automation, and digital marketing projects. Specialized in developing chatbots, interactive dashboards, time series and geospatial data pipelines, and implementing SEO/SEM strategies.

portfolio.subtitle: Check out some of my recent Data Science and AI projects

1.title: Sales Analysis Dashboard
1.description: Interactive dashboard developed with Streamlit for exploratory sales data analysis, with dynamic filters and advanced visualizations.

2.title: NLP Chatbot
2.description: Intelligent chatbot using natural language processing for customer service, with multi-channel integration.

3.title: Computer Vision System
3.description: Real-time object detection system using YOLO for image analysis in industrial applications.

4.title: Geospatial Data Pipeline
4.description: ETL pipeline for processing and analyzing geospatial data, with interactive map visualizations and automated reports.

5.title: Time Series Forecasting System
5.description: Machine Learning model for demand and sales forecasting using advanced time series techniques with LSTM and Prophet architectures.

6.title: Sentiment Analysis with NLP
6.description: Complete sentiment analysis system for product reviews and customer feedback with interactive visualization and automated reports.

7.title: Modular Question Answering Pipeline
7.description: A robust, modular, and parallel pipeline for processing and analyzing responses from multiple Question Answering (QA) models using the Hugging Face platform.

1.title: Data Analyst
1.1: Definition of scope and data modeling (ERD) for a project in the Ceará fashion market.
1.2: Collection, cleaning, and preparation of datasets using Python and analysis libraries.
1.3: Performance of Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and calculation of descriptive statistics.
1.4: Generation of interactive dashboards and reports for senior management using Power BI.

2.title: Data Analyst
2.1: Definition of scope and data modeling (ERD) for a project in the Ceará fashion market.
2.2: Collection, cleaning, and preparation of datasets using Python and analysis libraries.
2.3: Performance of Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and calculation of descriptive statistics.
2.4: Implementation of machine learning model (Random Forest) with metric evaluation.
2.5: Generation of interactive dashboards and reports for senior management using Streamlit.

3.title: Marketing and Commercial Analyst
3.1: Planning and management of digital campaigns (Google Ads, Meta Ads) with KPI monitoring.
3.2: Implementation of SEO and SEM strategies, resulting in increased organic traffic.
3.3: Creation and editing of audiovisual content for social media and sales funnels.
3.5: Support to the commercial team in customer prospecting and retention.

4.title: Marketing Analyst | Marketing Assistant
4.1: Development and monitoring of promotional campaigns.
4.2: Implementation of SEO/SEM strategies and content management for website and social media.
4.3: Creation of graphic content and maintenance of digital communication channels.

5.title: IT and Networks Technician
5.1: Assembly, maintenance, and configuration of IT infrastructure (computers, servers, TCP/IP networks, Wi-Fi).
5.2: Remote and on-site technical support, software installation, and access permissioning.
5.3: Technical consulting and preparation of proposals for equipment bidding.
